name: Smart Appointment Booking
description: AI-powered appointment scheduling with intelligent availability management
problem: Manual scheduling leads to double bookings, missed opportunities, and poor customer experience
how: Automated scheduling with calendar integration, availability optimization, and confirmation management

name: Intelligent Lead Qualification
description: Automated lead scoring and qualification based on conversation analysis
problem: Sales team wastes time on unqualified leads while high-value prospects slip through
how: AI analyzes conversations to score leads, routes qualified prospects to sales team automatically

name: Emergency Call Routing
description: Smart routing of urgent calls to appropriate staff members
problem: Emergency calls get mixed with routine inquiries, causing delays in critical situations
how: AI identifies urgent calls and routes them directly to on-call staff with escalation protocols

name: Voice Payment Processing
description: Secure payment collection through conversational interface
problem: Manual payment processing creates friction and delays in treatment acceptance
how: AI handles payment discussions, presents financing options, and processes payments securely

name: No-Show Prevention Agent
description: AI agent that prevents no-shows with voice reminders and waitlist management
problem: No-shows cost practices thousands in lost revenue and disrupt daily operations
how: Proactive voice reminders, flexible rescheduling, and intelligent waitlist management

name: Treatment Plan Closer Agent
description: AI agent specialized in closing pending treatment plans with payment options
problem: Cold treatment plans represent thousands in unrealized revenue sitting on the books
how: Systematic follow-up on pending plans with financing options and objection handling

name: Emergency Dispatch Agent
description: AI agent that handles HVAC calls 24/7, filters emergencies, and dispatches jobs
problem: After-hours emergencies generate the highest revenue but often go unanswered
how: 24/7 call handling with emergency detection, immediate dispatch, and customer updates

name: Quote Follow-Up Agent
description: AI agent that follows up on HVAC quotes, handles objections, and closes deals
problem: Most quotes die in follow-up, leaving thousands in potential revenue uncaptured
how: Systematic quote follow-up with objection handling and competitive positioning
